title: Ep 84: If You Don't Know Oud with Pinrose co-founder Erika Shumate
itunes:title: Ep 84: If You Don't Know Oud with Pinrose co-founder Erika Shumate
itunes:subtitle: Pinrose co-founder Erika Shumate explains how science can help you find a fragrance and drops mad knowledge about synesthesia, perfumers, and marketing to millennials (she has an MBA from Stanford, NBD). Before that: beauty pop-ups and the Glossier You...
description:
Pinrose co-founder Erika Shumate explains how science can help you find a fragrance and drops mad knowledge about synesthesia, perfumers, and marketing to millennials (she has an MBA from Stanford, NBD). Before that: beauty pop-ups and the Glossier You fragrance; an injectable filler that lasts five years and can help with acne scars; and how beauty editors actually test products. 

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
